local_variables.serif:
(xpart point 0 of lower_circle, ypart point 0 of lower_circle)
          -- (xpart point 0 of lower_circle, ypart point 0 of lower_circle-(1/3)*y_radius)

paths.name: lower_circle
serif
paths.base_definition:
(xpart point 0 of lower_circle, ypart point 0 of lower_circle)
          -- (xpart point 0 of lower_circle, ypart point 0 of lower_circle-(1/3)*y_radius)

draw_operations:
upper_circle
       .. tension 0.9
       .. lower_arc cutafter point 0.5 of lower_arc
point 0 of upper_loop -- point 0 of lower_loop

paths.name: outer_circle

draw_operations:
(outer_circle cutbefore point 0.55 of outer_circle cutafter point 4 of outer_circle)
       .. (loop cutbefore point 3 of loop cutafter point 5 of loop)
       .. point 3 of outer_circle

paths.name: outer_circle
outer_circle

swirl

draw_operations: point 0 of upper_loop -- point 0 of lower_loop

paths.name: lower_circle

local_variables.cross:
point 6 of loop
           .. point 6 of loop + (2x_radius, 0){right}
           .. tension 0.9
           .. point 6 of loop + (2.5x_radius, -0.25y_radius)

paths.name: cross
paths.base_definition:
point 6 of loop
           .. point 6 of loop + (2x_radius, 0){right}
           .. tension 0.9
           .. point 6 of loop + (2.5x_radius, -0.25y_radius)

draw_operations: reverse loop cutafter point 2 of loop cutbefore point 6 of loop
cross cutafter point 1.75 of cross cutbefore point 0 of cross
cross cutafter point 2 of cross cutbefore point 1 of cross
